sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit, OnDestroy } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpResponse } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Subscription } from 'rxjs'; import { EventManager } from 'app/core/util/event-manager.service'; import { AcmReport, UserGroups, RoleGroups, FunctionGroups, ResourceGroups } from './acm-report.model'; import { ApplicationService } from '../application/application.service'; import { AcmReportService } from './acm-report.service'; import { saveAs } from 'file-saver'; @Component({ selector: 'ic-acm-report', templateUrl: './acm-report.component.html', }) export class AcmReportComponent implements OnInit, OnDestroy { eventSubscriber?: Subscription; acmReport: AcmReport; selectedApplication: any; userGroups: any[]; resourceGroups: any[]; roleGroups: any[]; functionGroups: any[]; applications: any[] = []; constructor( protected applicationService: ApplicationService, protected acmReportService: AcmReportService, protected eventManager: EventManager ) { this.acmReport = new AcmReport(); this.userGroups = UserGroups; this.roleGroups = RoleGroups; this.functionGroups = FunctionGroups; this.resourceGroups = ResourceGroups; } handleChange(e: any): void { this.acmReport = new AcmReport(); this.acmReport.activeTabIndex = e.index; this.acmReport.appId = this.selectedApplication.appId; this.acmReport.appCode = this.selectedApplication.appCode; } handleSelect(e: any): void { this.acmReport.appId = e.value.appId; this.acmReport.appCode = e.value.appCode; } ngOnInit(): void { this.applicationService.query({}).subscribe(res => { this.applications = res.body ?? []; this.selectedApplication = this.applications[0]; this.acmReport.appCode = this.selectedApplication.appCode; }); } exportReport(): void { this.acmReportService.exportReport(this.acmReport).subscribe((res: HttpResponse) => { saveAs( new Blob([res.body], { type: 'application/download' }), decodeURI(res.headers.get('content-disposition')?.substring(21) ?? 'download') ); }); } ngOnDestroy(): void { if (this.eventSubscriber) { this.eventManager.destroy(this.eventSubscriber); } } }
